#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long rev(long long a)
{
    long long b=0;
    while(a)
    {
        b=b*10+a%10;
        a/=10;
    }
    return b;
}
int main()
{
  long long t,b,a,sum;
  cin>>t;
 while(t--)
  {
      cin>>a>>b;
      sum=rev(a)+rev(b);
      cout<<rev(sum)<<endl;
  }
}
